name: The Seven Sins (TheYoungProgrammer)
description: The game is all about going around, and fighting with the gun you have. The Health is obvius. If it goes to zero you die. The Sweat Bar is a secret. Try to see what it does and tell me in the comments your suggestions. The ammo is prety obvius too. You can shoot while it is NOT zero. There are crates in the game that give you ammo.
